external.description: Enable external access to the SeaweedFS filer from outside the cluster. Use this when `topology` is not set to `Client`.

host.description: The hostname used to access the SeaweedFS externally (defaults to 's3' subdomain for the tenant host).

remoteEndpoint.description: The endpoint of the remote filer GRPC service. Used when `topology` is set to `Client`.

replicationFactor.description: The number of replicas for each volume in the SeaweedFS cluster.

storageClass.description: StorageClass used to store the data

topology.description: The topology of the SeaweedFS cluster. (allowed values: Simple, MultiZone, Client)

zones.description: A map of zones for MultiZone topology. Each zone can have its own number of replicas and size.
